body_html:
I think we should drop the continuous tests for tutorials and models once we guarantee API stability.
I think at best, we will separate all their tests from core tensorflow. Tutorials will also move out of the core repo, and that is in part the reason for this.

So I think we can completely disable running tutorials instead in jenkins.
body_text:
I think we should drop the continuous tests for tutorials and models once we guarantee API stability.
I think at best, we will separate all their tests from core tensorflow. Tutorials will also move out of the core repo, and that is in part the reason for this.
So I think we can completely disable running tutorials instead in jenkins.
body:
I think we should drop the continuous tests for tutorials and models once we guarantee API stability.
I think at best, we will separate all their tests from core tensorflow. Tutorials will also move out of the core repo, and that is in part the reason for this.

So I think we can completely disable running tutorials instead in jenkins.
